user.title: Device Selection
user.description: Select your ventilation system devices and number of zones

data_description.remote_device: The ramses_cc remote device to control the system
data_description.fan_device: The physical fan device to control
data_description.num_zones: Enter the number of ventilation zones (1-5). Each zone will have its own message ID and fan rate settings.

fan_settings.title: Fan Settings
fan_settings.description: Configure your ventilation fan speed settings

zone_config_1.title: Zone 1: Message Configuration
zone_config_1.description: Configure message IDs and fan rate limits for Zone 1

data_description.id_from: Source device ID (e.g., '29:162275' for remote device)
data_description.id_to: Target device ID (e.g., '32:146231' for zone fan/valve)
data_description.sensor_id: Sensor identifier for this zone in the message (0-255, defaults to 255 for zone 1, 254 for zone 2, etc.)
data_description.min_fan_rate: Minimum fan speed value for this zone (0-255)
data_description.max_fan_rate: Maximum fan speed value for this zone (0-255)

zone_config_2.title: Zone 2: Message Configuration
zone_config_2.description: Configure message IDs and fan rate limits for Zone 2

data_description.id_from: Source device ID (e.g., '29:162275' for remote device)
data_description.id_to: Target device ID (e.g., '32:146232' for zone fan/valve)
data_description.sensor_id: Sensor identifier for this zone in the message (0-255, defaults to 255 for zone 1, 254 for zone 2, etc.)
data_description.min_fan_rate: Minimum fan speed value for this zone (0-255)
data_description.max_fan_rate: Maximum fan speed value for this zone (0-255)

zone_config_3.title: Zone 3: Message Configuration
zone_config_3.description: Configure message IDs and fan rate limits for Zone 3

data_description.id_from: Source device ID (e.g., '29:162275' for remote device)
data_description.id_to: Target device ID (e.g., '32:146233' for zone fan/valve)
data_description.sensor_id: Sensor identifier for this zone in the message (0-255, defaults to 255 for zone 1, 254 for zone 2, etc.)
data_description.min_fan_rate: Minimum fan speed value for this zone (0-255)
data_description.max_fan_rate: Maximum fan speed value for this zone (0-255)

zone_config_4.title: Zone 4: Message Configuration
zone_config_4.description: Configure message IDs and fan rate limits for Zone 4

data_description.id_from: Source device ID (e.g., '29:162275' for remote device)
data_description.id_to: Target device ID (e.g., '32:146234' for zone fan/valve)
data_description.sensor_id: Sensor identifier for this zone in the message (0-255, defaults to 255 for zone 1, 254 for zone 2, etc.)
data_description.min_fan_rate: Minimum fan speed value for this zone (0-255)
data_description.max_fan_rate: Maximum fan speed value for this zone (0-255)

zone_config_5.title: Zone 5: Message Configuration
zone_config_5.description: Configure message IDs and fan rate limits for Zone 5

data_description.id_from: Source device ID (e.g., '29:162275' for remote device)
data_description.id_to: Target device ID (e.g., '32:146235' for zone fan/valve)
data_description.sensor_id: Sensor identifier for this zone in the message (0-255, defaults to 255 for zone 1, 254 for zone 2, etc.)
data_description.min_fan_rate: Minimum fan speed value for this zone (0-255)
data_description.max_fan_rate: Maximum fan speed value for this zone (0-255)

pid_parameters.title: PID Parameters
pid_parameters.description: Configure your PID controller algorithm settings

data_description.setpoint: Target air quality index (0.0 = excellent air, 5.0 = very poor air)
data_description.kp: How aggressively the system responds to air quality changes (0.1-1000)
data_description.ki_times: How fast the error is integrated. 3600 means it takes approximately 1 hour for the fan to reach 100%.
data_description.update_interval: How often to check sensors and adjust the fan (10-3600 seconds). Choosing this too small can upset ramses_cc. Choose a value larger than ramses_cc gateway scan interval.

sensor_types.title: Sensor Types
sensor_types.description: Select which types of air quality sensors you want to use

data_description.use_co2_sensors: Carbon Dioxide sensors (ppm) - Primary air quality indicator
data_description.use_voc_sensors: Volatile Organic Compounds sensors (ppb) - Chemical pollutants
data_description.use_pm_sensors: Particulate Matter sensors (µg/m³) - Dust and particles
data_description.use_humidity_sensors: Humidity sensors (%) - Relative water content of air

air_quality_indices.title: Air Quality Indices
air_quality_indices.description: Configure air quality index thresholds for automatic sensor weighting

data_description.co2_index: Six comma-separated CO2 thresholds in ppm for air quality indices 0-5
data_description.voc_index: Six comma-separated VOC thresholds for 'volatile_organic_compounds' sensors (indices 0-5)
data_description.voc_ppm_index: Six comma-separated VOC thresholds for 'volatile_organic_compounds_parts' sensors (indices 0-5)
data_description.pm_1_0_index: Six comma-separated PM1.0 thresholds in µg/m³ for air quality indices 0-5
data_description.pm_2_5_index: Six comma-separated PM2.5 thresholds in µg/m³ for air quality indices 0-5
data_description.pm_10_index: Six comma-separated PM10 thresholds in µg/m³ for air quality indices 0-5
data_description.humidity_index: Six comma-separated humidity thresholds in % above the average that day for air quality indices 0-5

co2_sensors.title: CO2 Sensors
co2_sensors.description: Select your CO2 sensors. For multi-zone setups, you'll assign sensors to zones in the next step.

data_description.co2_sensors: Select one or more CO2 sensor entities for air quality monitoring

co2_sensors_zones.title: CO2 Sensors - Zone Assignment
co2_sensors_zones.description: Assign each CO2 sensor to the zone it monitors. Each sensor can monitor a different zone in your ventilation system.

data_description.co2_sensor_0_zone: Choose which zone this CO2 sensor monitors
data_description.co2_sensor_1_zone: Choose which zone this CO2 sensor monitors
data_description.co2_sensor_2_zone: Choose which zone this CO2 sensor monitors
data_description.co2_sensor_3_zone: Choose which zone this CO2 sensor monitors
data_description.co2_sensor_4_zone: Choose which zone this CO2 sensor monitors

voc_sensors.title: VOC Sensors
voc_sensors.description: Select your VOC sensors. For multi-zone setups, you'll assign sensors to zones in the next step.

data_description.voc_sensors: Select one or more VOC sensor entities for air quality monitoring

voc_sensors_zones.title: VOC Sensors - Zone Assignment
voc_sensors_zones.description: Assign each VOC sensor to the zone it monitors. Each sensor can monitor a different zone in your ventilation system.

data_description.voc_sensor_0_zone: Choose which zone this VOC sensor monitors
data_description.voc_sensor_1_zone: Choose which zone this VOC sensor monitors
data_description.voc_sensor_2_zone: Choose which zone this VOC sensor monitors
data_description.voc_sensor_3_zone: Choose which zone this VOC sensor monitors
data_description.voc_sensor_4_zone: Choose which zone this VOC sensor monitors

pm_sensors.title: PM Sensors
pm_sensors.description: Select your PM sensors. For multi-zone setups, you'll assign sensors to zones in the next step.

data_description.pm_sensors: Select one or more PM sensor entities - PM1, PM2.5, or PM10

pm_sensors_zones.title: PM Sensors - Zone Assignment
pm_sensors_zones.description: Assign each PM sensor to the zone it monitors. Each sensor can monitor a different zone in your ventilation system.

data_description.pm_sensor_0_zone: Choose which zone this PM sensor monitors
data_description.pm_sensor_1_zone: Choose which zone this PM sensor monitors
data_description.pm_sensor_2_zone: Choose which zone this PM sensor monitors
data_description.pm_sensor_3_zone: Choose which zone this PM sensor monitors
data_description.pm_sensor_4_zone: Choose which zone this PM sensor monitors

humidity_sensors.title: Humidity Sensors
humidity_sensors.description: Select your humidity sensors. For multi-zone setups, you'll assign sensors to zones in the next step.

data_description.humidity_sensors: Select one or more humidity sensor entities for humidity-based control

humidity_sensors_zones.title: Humidity Sensors - Zone Assignment
humidity_sensors_zones.description: Assign each humidity sensor to the zone it monitors. Each sensor can monitor a different zone in your ventilation system.

data_description.humidity_sensor_0_zone: Choose which zone this humidity sensor monitors
data_description.humidity_sensor_1_zone: Choose which zone this humidity sensor monitors
data_description.humidity_sensor_2_zone: Choose which zone this humidity sensor monitors
data_description.humidity_sensor_3_zone: Choose which zone this humidity sensor monitors
data_description.humidity_sensor_4_zone: Choose which zone this humidity sensor monitors

advanced.title: Advanced Settings
advanced.description: Configure advanced PID controller timing parameters for each air quality level

data_description.ki_times: Six comma-separated Ki time constants for each air quality level (60-7200 seconds each). Format: level0,level1,level2,level3,level4,level5 (e.g., 3600,1800,900,450,225,150)

error.invalid_range: Value is outside the valid range
error.no_sensor_types: At least one sensor type must be selected
error.no_sensors: At least one sensor must be selected

data_description.setpoint: Target air quality index (0.0 = excellent air, 5.0 = very poor air)
data_description.kp: How aggressively the system responds to air quality changes (0.1-1000)
data_description.ki_times: How fast the error is integrated. 3600 means it takes approximately 1 hour for the fan to reach 100%.
data_description.update_interval: How often to check sensors and adjust the fan (10-3600 seconds). Should be larger than your ramses_cc gateway scan interval for optimal performance.
